short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My mid-2015 MacBook Pro has white flashes and stuttering when watching Netflix with subtitles on. This fixes that for me.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Internet is full of people experiencing flickering and stuttering with Netflix when using subtitles. It's a long-standing issue. This extensions contains a fix for this. It works for me on my mid-2015 Macbook Pro. I hope it works for you too.
